user.title: Connect to WLED
user.description: Enter the address of your WLED device to get started.

data_description.wled_host: IP address or hostname of the WLED device

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to WLED device. Check the host and port.

abort.already_configured: This WLED device is already configured.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this visualization
data_description.entity_id: The Home Assistant sensor entity to visualize
data_description.segment_id: WLED segment to render on (set up segments in WLED first)
data_description.num_leds: How many LEDs are in this segment
data_description.floor: Sensor value that maps to 0% (cool / low end)
data_description.ceiling: Sensor value that maps to 100% (hot / high end)
data_description.color_low: LED color when the sensor is at the floor value
data_description.color_high: LED color when the sensor is at the ceiling value
data_description.wled_fx: WLED animation effect — the sensor value drives the color while the effect handles movement
data_description.speed_min: Effect speed at the floor value (0-255)
data_description.speed_max: Effect speed at the ceiling value (0-255)
data_description.mirror: Mirror the animation so it looks symmetrical on a rack loop
data_description.include_black: Insert black between the two generated colors for higher contrast and more dramatic movement
data_description.update_interval: How often to push updates to WLED (lower = more responsive)
